title: Sweetie Pie's Cookbook: 40 Must-Make Great American Pie Recipes
description: There isn’t a single month in the year when the nation doesn’t celebrate one sweet, great American pie or another.  From National Pie Day in January to Great American Pie Month in February to Boston Cream Pie in October and National Pie Day in December, America sure does love dessert!  There is nothing more American than a piece of homemade pie! And it generally takes pride of place on the Thanksgiving and 4th of July family dinner table.  The Sweetie Pie Cookbook brings together a collection of 40 Must-Have Great American Pie Recipes.  Choose from some all-time traditional pies including:-  • Banana Cream Pie • Grasshopper Pie • Huckleberry Pie • Peanut Butter Silk Pie • Pumpkin Cream Pie  And discover some new, great American pie flavors including:  • Frosty Lemonade Pie • Peanut Butter n’ Jelly Pie • Watermelon Pie  What’s more, for anyone who prefers homemade to store-bought pastry check out our basic single-crust and double-crust pie recipes.  For anyone with a sweet tooth, there is nothing quite as good as the taste of a great American pie.
author: Christina Tosch
